TopicTitle: Time warp gives me infinite acceleration

Articles.Content:
Version: 0.90.0.705 Steam

OS: Windows 7 64 bit

Mods: All Stock

Whenever I attempt to timewarp in low orbit, at around 80k, my ship locks up (regardless of whether SAS is on or not) and my apoapsis begins moving without any thrust from my craft. Even if I happen to be in retrograde, thrusting does nothing to change my vector or velocity. This is in a new career mode.

Intel Core i7-2700K CPU @ 3.50GHz

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570

8.00 GB RAM

http://i.imgur.com/5ZDX4lu.png This is the craft in its full form

http://i.imgur.com/DA2V5Em.png This is what made it to orbit

Edited January 12, 2015 by Moogle

I'm not trying to be a jerk or anything, but just like the other thread, we need pictures or a .craft file to give meaningful advise. There are many reasons this could be happening, including part clipping and/or use of the claw.

Giving us more info helps us to give specific advice, instead of just guessing.

Thanks,

-Claw
Some pictures have been added. This however has happened to every craft I have sent up. No claws or part clipping in any craft.

Congratulation, you've got yourself a nice Kraken-drive!

But seriously, does this happen if you reload a previous save or (even better) if you start a new career or sandbox?
